public class DatabaseHandler

printResultSet

protected void printResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet result)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
Helper function that prints result set to console for debug purposes.
Note: This function does not render result set to html layer, please see Utilities.renderResultSet() to render result set.

Parameters:
result - result set to be printed
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - if query of result set does not execute properly
